title: must visit in that area
review: not to miss this place since it is more of a holiday place with less commotion. you have very good and reasonable adventure sports like zorbing, flying fox, zip line, paragliding etc. its worth doing these sports here since the views are natural and green. its a quaint place just 5kms from bhimtal. the feel of this place is mush better and different. not sure of any good restaurants around.

title: An eve when soul was free
review: Go for a walk around kamal taal. Take a shikara ride while serenading ur favourite song and know what it means to stay in this mad fray.

title: boating in naukuchiatal lake is great experience. Water is so clean.
review: boating in naukuchiatal lake is great experience. Water is so clean.  boats are well maintained and boatman very courteous and friendly. Kamal tal next door is a beautiful lake full of lotus flowers.

title: MUST VISIT AND STAY
review: I stayed at Club mahindra Naukuchiatal and spent two days walking around the place and the lake.The Lake is the biggest with nine corners .The authorities have cleaned the lake and is maintaining it.Walk down to KMVN TRH where the boats ,kayak,ziplines are available to spend one's time on the lake.The surrounding is calm,quiet and green and you can spend hours boating .Adventure sports like para gliding is also available.Parichay TRH of KMVN has been renovated with new cottages on the other corner of the lake.There is big statue of Hanuman near the tal.In the evening you can have a wonderful sight of sunset..

title: Misty Days and foggy nights
review: My trip Naukuchia taal was a trip to remember for me.This taal has 9 corners hence the name. It has a boating facility that you can use. We visited in raining season ..You can feel the mist and fog all over..... You a have a cuppa coffee/tea and enjoy the boating ride or the view by just sitting besides the taal

title: Excellent Place to relax in the lap of mountains
review: We were a group of 8 (some couples and some stags). The drive from Delhi was very good. We tried the rout via nainital as someone suggested that direct route from Kathgodam might not be in good condition. The place is clean and quiet; far better than nainital and other main stream destinations. The lake itself is beautiful and you would get boating options. The good part Is that you can go for boating even if it is raining s all the boats (peddling and shikaras) come with a roof. We visited in Aug end so obviously we were surrounded by clouds and accompanied with rains. It was fun to boat in such a lovely weather. You would find some good accommodation options – Lake resort (expensive), Aadrika (best in terms of value for money) and some decent cafes. You can simply walk alongside the lake and enjoy the weather. I would suggest to pick a room with full view of the lake so you may enjoy sunrise/sunset accordingly. I recommend this place if you are looking for some peace and freshness.

title: ideal place for boating and water activities.
review: best place in and around nainital or bhimtal for water activities.  well maintained lake. paddle boat or kayak ride for 250 /-.

title: Serene Lake to spend some wonderful peaceful time !
review: Clean , peaceful lake surrounded by lush greenery and wonderful clouds during rainy season , Naukuchiatal is a wonderful lake, to spend some tranquil time in lap of Mother Nature ! One can simply walk along the lake and enjoy the wonderful weather :)

title: Best place for water sport near nainital.
review: Beautiful lake ...

title: Very nice and better than Nainintal
review: This is the biggest and deepest lake of the Nainital district. Since it is at remote place it is calm and uncrowded place.

title: It's near Nainital and not ranikhet
review: This Naukuchia taal is 23 km from nainital towards kathgodam and not near to ranikhet. There are boating, paragliding and water sports activity available.

title: Less crowded than Nainital.....
review: This lake has nine corners which is why it is called so.....boating is a nice experience .... One can do regular boating, paddle boat , kayaking and other activities like zorbing......

title: natural lake with own source of water
review: the naturally formed deep lake has nine corners hence called as Navkuchia taal(lake) each corner is such located that they can not be seen from next corner.boating is very peasant ans area is large

title: Nice visit
review: It's awesome, must visit place to see.big lake with beautiful view.you can enjoy boating also.Ballroller you can take, charges are little high.small market area with local taste.

title: Perfect boating experience
review: Awesome  neat and clean lake.Full of fishes and location is very green.  Can stay at KMVN or so many other hotels. Perfect place to enjoy for kids with option of pony riding,boating etc. Not too crowded place close to Bhimtal .

title: One of a kind Lake with 9 corners
review: The boat ride at Naukuchiatal cannot be described in words, it ws beautiful, serene, calm, with nine corners which has lead to this name Nau Kuchia, Best to visit in any season, specially monsoon and winters, Should take the hand held boat for the best feel like the Dal lake in Kashmir,

title: Drive about
review: Very serene and clean lake. Environmentally very positive location with clean and wooded banks. Due to the lack of land available for disorganized development this remains another very clean and peaceful lake. The hotels on the sides of the lake are also dedicated to keeping the lakeside unspoiled.

title: Waste of time!
review: Not maintained properly, very dirty, Boating is too costly as compared to quality of the lake! Avoid as much as possible.

title: Awesome Weekend Gateway
review: Me and my friends just visited Naukuchia Taal. This is an awesome landscape where you can do Boating, Trekking, Paragliding etc. You can also visit the Popular Hanuman temple.

title: biggest lake
review: Naukuchia means 9 corners.No one can see all 9 corners from one angle due to its large expansion.It is biggest lake in Nainital district.here you can enjoy lake with peace.Must taste cheetu's mutton/chicken.He cooks only on order so go with full time to taste pahari non veg.

title: Serene
review: The lake has fewer visitor's than others lakes, and thus is more peaceful.

title: Just another lake
review: Not so special place. Bhimtal is much better than this taal. If you wish to enjoy lake go to Bhimtal in place of naukuchia or nainital.

title: Amazing lake with nice serne
review: Few people are visit this lake as its not big as compare to others. But natural serene near this lake is awesome and you can feel relax and peace.

title: Serene and beautiful
review: The lake has boating facility n nothing much apart from that. One could sit there n marvel at the lake n natural beauty strewn all around n do nothing. Better than bheem tal but don't go with too many expectations.

title: Simply Serene
review: Its a beautiful place to just hang out and do nothing... There are some activities available but these activities can be done anywhere else in India. Need not waste time on these activities..

title: Beautiful lake and a must do Boating destination
review: Clean waters and serene beauty around makes it a wonderful experience specially for boating. Staying here is bit expensive than Nainital hence better to stay at Nainital and visit Nakuchiyatal.

title: Good place to visit
review: Good for outing with family. I went there while I was traveling to Ranikhet. We enjoyed Boating and few other activities.

title: Nice place
review: A lake, where adventure sports are available. I found some of them to be mediocre. But the some like paragliding over the lake was fun

title: Lake of nine corners.
review: Even though my destination was Nainital, I ended up going to Bhimtal and surrounding places.

title: Did not find anything special
review: After seeing a couple of other lakes before, didn't find anything different or special out here. A good spot for the adventure crowd.

title: Nice Lake
review: Good looking. Quite big. Quite. Serene. You can paddle boat as well. Nothing nearby. It is best to take a car from Bhimtal/Nanital and visit and come back

title: Offbeat Oasis
review: Away from the crowd, naukuchiataal is equally beautiful and quiet. One can enjoy nature without doing much here. Go for paragliding, which is a must do in naukuchiatal. Contact TRH and pay fixed amount (1500/person) photos and videos extra-800 (that their people make from the SLR camera from ground)..Bargain for photos and videos if you want Or make your own videos (better option)

title: Big Lake with Clean Water !
review: Naukuchia Taal is one of the biggest lake of Uttarakhand with clean water . It is a perfect place for families and children to spent some good time . Don't miss a chance to take boat in this lake ( because its ultimate experience ) .

title: beautiful
review: dont miss the kayaking. if you bargain, they will charge 200 INR for 30 minutes. try to go for solo kayaking without the trainer.

title: Naukuchia Tal
review: A nice lake, in two parts, one of them called Kamal Taal (Lotus Pond). A good picnic spot. Nice natural beauty, and not too far from Bhim Taal (only 6 KM). On the way there is para gliding sports adventure also on offer, if one would like to do that. If one is staying in one of the resorts nearby it is fine, but otherwise food options are rather limited. There is government run restaurant by the side of the lake, but then it requires quite some time to prepare food as per order. The food quality though is good there. Suggest combine visit to other tails like Bhim Taal and Sat Taal too if visiting from Nainitaal, unless one is staying in a nearby resort.

title: Good for adventure
review: Very calm and quite place , good for people searching for peace . The Taal has clear water and is the deepest in the region , although it's not as cold as Nainital here due to the height.

title: Mesmerising place
review: One of the many lakes the lower himalayan region of Nainital is famous for- Naukuchiatal (नौकुचियाताल) is one of the biggest among them and perhaps most serene. The only lake comparable to this in serenity will be the Sattal. Located at an altitude of 1220 metres, this is also the deepest lake in the region. Fed by underground perennial spring, this lake is an all the year round spot to be. Might not suit those bubbly-shubbly north Indian tourists who prefer to have some ‘happening’ spot, but will certainly be liken by all those who want to spend some quite quality time in the lap of nature.

title: pretty lake
review: It is a poor man's Nainital lake minus the bad crowd. My kids did Zorbing there and they couldn't have had more fun.

title: a place for adventure sport
review: the place is famous for paragliding.three lakes mIngle Chantal,spatial and naukuciyatal make it a children friendly place too.

title: for nature lovers, an enchanting, tranquil  place.
review: Naukuchia tal (  lake  with nine corners )is a small hillstation in Nainital district.Situated about 4 kilometers from Bhimtal, it is a lovely lake ,the deepest in the lake district. Fed by underground  perennial   springs , surrounded by woods, hills and valleys,  it is the most enchanting and tranquil of all the lakes  in Nainital district. A boat ride in the deep ,tranquil waters is quite a refreshing experience ; the lake is full of fishes  ,  and many oxygen plants are seen aerating the waters. The valley is a popular spot for paraglding and other sports activities.   A visit to this bewitching lake is a must if your tour itinerary includes the lake district of Utharakhand.

title: nauchukia tal is near bhimtal
review: nauchukia tal is near bhimtal not near raniket-it is a nine cornered lake ,but the surrounding are not clean due to local peoples daily activities,the view from kmvn guest house adjoing the lake is beautiful-do not forget the 'THORN FULL BALLON FLOWER TREES " IN the kmvn guest house garden.

title: Must experience paragliding
review: While we ventured out towards Bhimtaal and Naukuchia Taal, we were disappointed to find them pretty boring compared to the Naini Taal (lake) However, all this was compensated by breathtaking experience of paragliding.

title: Secluded, in the middle of the mountains
review: The lake is the largest in area and had 9 corners. The tale is that if one can spot all the nine corners, their deepest wishes would come true.

title: can skip
review: only good if you staying at one of the resorts near by or like adventure sports. otherwise its just the same as naini lake. a little far form nainital though its about a 90 mins drive

title: Huge lake with nice scenic beauty.
review: Huge lake with nice scenic beauty. As per the locals it's the largest lake among this district. Will definitely like boating in this green colored water body. Very few options to stay.

title: Naukuchiatal
review: Naukuchiatal or ‘lake of nine corners’ is a small hill station in Nainital district of the Indian state of Uttarakhand. It is believed that this lake was created after hard worship(Hindi "tap") of Brahmaji and a small temple dedicated to Brahmaji exist near the KMVN guesthouse. According to locals anyone performing a parikarma of the lake will be blessed by Brahmaji.

title: Excellent
review: By the time, we finished our visit to Kainchi Dham, it was getting late but we did not want to miss Naukchia tal. So, we persisted. By the time, we reached there it was about sunset time. we had a very good view of sun set there. The lake was amazing. The drive was good we just admired the beauty for a few minutes before returning. Even for short visit, it was good.

title: naukuchia taal
review: Naukuchia taal is arround 5 km from the bhimtaal .it is very neat and clean and big .it is surrounded by 9 mountains so it is calles naukuchia taal .here you can enjoy river rafting and at some distance parchute glidding too

title: Awsome Paragliding experience
review: Hi Guys, if you are a True adventure lover and You would like to make your trip memorable do not forget to take a ride with the professionals and touch the sky. This is a major attraction of this place, post rides you get DVD and hard copies from a professional photographers. There are flyings from 5000 to 8000 FTS, above 80 kg people its not useful as there is a limitation regarding weight but don't forget to enjoy the scenic beauty. Visit it with your family and if flying in parachutes inspires you to get wings go get it:)

title: Better than Nainital
review: Hye

title: bigger lake than Naini Lake
review: we had enjoyed lake boating previously we had done at Nainital, quiet a good experience as well.lake nearby places are dirty, people doesnt bother to thro rappers after eating there food.overall good experience.

title: Very calm and quiet lake
review: We went to NKC taal for a day trip. We enjoyed the serene beauty of the place sitting in a paddle boat for an hour. We are not the 'read book in a quiet place' kinds so a day trip was just what we wanted.

title: Paragliding at Naukuchiataal.
review: Beatiful valley to enjoy Paragliding . Numerous operators are available offering paragliding with trained and certified pilots to make your flight a memorable experience. You can also purchase pics and a video of your flight. Must try ...

title: Peaceful, calm, serene, relaxing & yummy food …. What else you need on a holiday!!
review: Its a perfect place for a short vacation with family or friends. Six hrs drive from Delhi and all the places you might want to visit in that area are 20 – 45 mins away from the hotel. I visited this property over the Christmas weekend with few friends and now have excellent memories from this vacation. Barbeque organized on 25th night was just great, bonfire was arranged every evening as it was quite chilly during late evenings.

title: Nothing great in visiting Naukuchia taal
review: If you have visited Naini lake then there is no need to visit the lake in nauhuchiatal.  However, boating experience is good.  Apart from this there are some adventure sports which we did not do so cannot comment on it

title: Lotus and more lotus
review: one side of taal is full of lotus and its treat to watch. side-by KMVN resort also has a good lawn with variety of flowers.

title: Natural beauty
review: A quiet place for nature lovers ! You must go for a morning walk here. Though I went there with my colleagues for an offsite but I enjoyed it completely.

title: must visit in that area
review: not to miss this place since it is more of a holiday place with less commotion. you have very good and reasonable adventure sports like zorbing, flying fox, zip line, paragliding etc. its worth doing these sports here since the views are natural and green. its a quaint place just 5kms from bhimtal. the feel of this place is mush better and different. not sure of any good restaurants around.

We visited in raining season ..You can feel the mist and fog all over..... You a have a cuppa coffee/tea and enjoy the boating ride or the view by just sitting besides the taal

title: The place for Kayaking
review: This place is same as other Taals in Nainital. The only differentiator is the Kayaks which are available on rent. Didnt find them at Bhimtaal and Saatal

title: boating in naukuchiatal lake is great experience. Water is so clean.
review: boating in naukuchiatal lake is great experience. Water is so clean.  boats are well maintained and boatman very courteous and friendly. Kamal tal next door is a beautiful lake full of lotus flowers.

review: best place in and around nainital or bhimtal for water activities.  well maintained lake. paddle boat or kayak ride for 250 /-.

title: Best place for water sport near nainital.
review: Beautiful lake ...
